#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#define Get getchar_unlocked()
int getInt() { int a=0,s=1; char c=0; while(c<33) c=Get; if(c=='-') {s=-1; c=Get;} while(c>33) {a=(a<<3)+(a<<1)+c-'0'; c=Get;} return a*s; }
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t=getInt();
	while(t--)
    {
        int n=getInt();
        long fact=1;
        for(int i=2; i<=n; i++)
            fact*=i;
        cout<<fact<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
